title: INtravel
description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from INtravel, skipping any feeds with errors.

items.title: Maximize your Amex Platinum statement credit during Lululemon’s Black Friday sale
items.description: Lululemon's Black Friday sale offers cozy legging from $39, sports bras from $19 and comfy sneakers from $59. Here are our favorite picks.
